entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 60 percent chance of showers later this afternoon. Risk of a thundershower this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 24. Humidex 27. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thundershower this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 12 May 2023
